references.paper_title: Stable video diffusion: Scaling latent video diffusion models to large datasets
references.reason: This paper introduces the Stable Video Diffusion model, which serves as the foundation for the proposed SG-I2V method in this work.
This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models, the core concept underlying video diffusion models which are leveraged by this paper.

references.paper_title: ediff-i: Text-to-image diffusion models with an ensemble of expert denoisers
references.reason: This paper provides insights into text-to-image diffusion models that inform the development of this work.
This paper presents an analysis of semantic correspondences in image diffusion models which is crucial for developing spatial control in this work.

references.paper_title: Draganything: Motion control for anything using entity representation
references.reason: This paper is referenced due to its focus on DragAnything, a method that shares similarities with this paper's approach to trajectory control.
